scripts.android:init: npx cap init "Advanced Clinical Documentation Assistant" com.example.acda --web-dir=dist
scripts.android:sync: npm run build && npx cap sync android
scripts.android:build:debug: npm run build && npx cap sync android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug
scripts.android:build:release: npm run build && npx cap sync android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease
